summary.span: 提供对有关当前用户的信息的访问。

span.span: Provides access to the information about the current user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性和方法公开的`My.User`对象提供对有关当前用户的信息的访问。The properties and methods exposed by the `My.User` object provide access to the information about the current user. Windows 和 Web 应用程序之间，"当前用户"的含义略有不同。The meaning of "current user" differs slightly between Windows and Web applications. 在 Windows 应用中，当前用户是运行应用程序的用户。In a Windows application, the current user is the user who runs the application. 在 Web 应用程序中，当前用户是访问该应用程序的用户。In a Web application, the current user is the user who accesses the application. `My.User`属性还提供对访问为当前用户。The `My.User` property also provides access to the for the current user. 主体对象表示用户的安全上下文，包括该用户的标识和用户属于任何角色。A principal object represents the user's security context, including that user's identity and any roles to which the user belongs. 对于 Windows 应用程序，此属性提供相同的功能属性。For Windows applications, this property provides the same functionality as the property. 对于 Web 应用程序，此属性提供相同的功能属性返回的对象属性。For Web applications, this property provides the same functionality as the property of the object returned by the property. > [!NOTE] > 对于 Windows 应用程序，只有项目基于**Windows 应用程序**模板初始化`My.User`默认情况下的对象。For Windows applications, only projects built on the **Windows Application** template initialize the `My.User` object by default. 在所有其他 Windows 项目类型中，你必须初始化`My.User`对象通过调用方法显式或分配到的值。In all other Windows project types, you must initialize the `My.User` object by calling the method explicitly or by assigning a value to . > [!NOTE] > `My.User`对象无法报告有关当前 Windows 用户在 Windows 95 和 Windows 98 下时运行，因为这些操作系统不支持登录的用户的概念的信息。The `My.User` object cannot report information about the current Windows user when run under Windows 95 and Windows 98 because those operating systems do not support the concept of a logged-on user. 必须实现自定义身份验证用于`My.User`这些操作系统上的对象...You must implement custom authentication to use the `My.User` object on those operating systems.. ## Examples 此示例检查是否应用程序正在使用 Windows 或自定义身份验证，并使用该信息来分析`My.User.Name`属性。This example checks if the application is using Windows or custom authentication, and uses that information to parse the `My.User.Name` property. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyUser#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyUser/VB/Class1.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性和方法公开的`My.User`对象提供对有关当前用户的信息的访问。The properties and methods exposed by the `My.User` object provide access to the information about the current user.

summary.span: 获取或设置表示当前用户的主体对象。

span.span: Gets or sets the principal object representing the current user.

value.span: 一个表示当前用户的 对象。

span.span: An object representing the current user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在对象中，此属性包装属性属性。In the object, this property wraps the property of the property. 有关详细信息，请参阅属性。For more detailed information, see the property.
